qas.question: Which Nigerian leader transferred power in 1979?
Which Nigerian leader received power in 1979?
How did Nigerians view the Shagari administration?
Who led a military coup against Shagari?
When did another military coup overthrow Buhari?

context: Beginning in 1979, Nigerians participated in a brief return to democracy when <a0_0>Olusegun Obasanjo<a0_0/> transferred power to the civilian regime of <a1_0>Shehu Shagari<a1_0/>. The Shagari government became viewed as <a2_0>corrupt and incompetent<a2_0/> by virtually all sectors of Nigerian society. The military coup of <a3_0>Muhammadu Buhari<a3_0/> shortly after the regime's fraudulent re-election in 1984 was generally viewed as a positive development. Buhari promised major reforms, but his government fared little better than its predecessor. His regime was overthrown by another military coup in <a4_0>1985<a4_0/>.
